response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This exceptional item carries a unique value that we believe is unparalleled in the market. We are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $18,000. This is a special opportunity to own a piece that not only meets but exceeds expectations, offering both functionality and luxury. We trust that you will find immense value in this product, and we look forward to the possibility of serving your needs. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Thank you for considering our offer.", "product_price": 18000}
